text: "Serenade to Spring" is a melody composed by Rolf Løvland, originally released on Secret Garden's debut album Songs from a Secret Garden (1995). The melody is an instrumental version of the Norwegian song "Danse mot vår" (lit.: Dance towards spring), also made by Rolf Løvland. It was originally released on Elisabeth Andreassen's album Stemninger (1992). She scored a 1992 Norsktoppen hit with the song. The song is available with Korean lyrics, as well. ==References== Category:Norwegian songs Category:1992 songs Category:Songs written by Rolf Løvland
title: Serenade to Spring
